title: Care and Feeding of Your New Pet: Clam Dragon
description: Have you ever wished you owned a dragon? Are you looking into getting one? Have you thought of the practical issues you will be facing? Is your carpet graded for slagged steal droplets? What kind of feeder faeries do you use? How do you tell your pet "no" and make it stick?Aimed at the new owner, this humorous illustrated short how-to book explains everything a new owner will need to know on how to raise the rare clam dragon. Chapters cover medical, diet, discipline and play, as well as other helpful advice.However, not just new owners will find this how-to to be of benefit. Friends of clam dragons owners, neighbours, emergency service personel and those looking into getting a clam dragon of their own, will also find this book informative and rewarding.
author: Feath Pym
